message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000.  I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still not sure $13,000 is the sweet spot. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can we meet in the middle of that?
